overview: In Bob Chinnâ€™s big budget mix of X rated war epic and Nazisploitation, John Holmes stars as an American G.I. who gets marooned on a tropical island after his ship is bombed. There he discovers a small Nazi outpost which has kidnapped a beautiful American nurse. Determined to save her, he slowly begins to infiltrate the Nazi compound.
tagline: Kidnapped for bizarre sex rites... on a sun-drenched island of SIN!
title: Prisoner of Paradise
